pages.text: The $(mob)Wolf$() is an animal that spawns in $(thing)Taigas$(). It hunts $(l:minecraft_rabbit)$(mob)Rabbits$(), $(l:minecraft_sheep)$(mob)Sheeps$() and $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Skeletons$() on sight by lunging at them dealing damage on contact. It will also attack players that attack it.$(p)It can be tamed by giving it $(l:minecraft_skeleton)$(mob)Bones$(), making it follow the tamer and assisting it in combat. Tamed $(mob)Wolves$() do not attack passive mobs on sight.
